name: ad_cue_points
title: Advertisement Cue Points
summary: Learn how to place advertisements at specific points in your videos

steps.title: Select a Media Entry
steps.description:
Choose a video from your library to add cue points to.

You'll also need to select a uiConf that has cue point tracking enabled. To enable cue point tracking, [visit the KMC](http://kmc.kaltura.com/index.php/kmc/kmc4#studio|universal_studio), click the Monetization ($) tab, and check "Track cue points" under the Vast tab

You can use ```cuePoint.list``` to see what cue points are already attached.

steps.title: Adding a Cue Point
steps.description: Use the form in the [Live Demo](#LiveDemo) window below to add cue points to your video.

codeSnippet.node:
<lucy include="AddAdCuePointForm"></lucy>
<script>
  $('#AddAdCuePointForm').submit(function() {
    var data = $(this).serialize();
    $.ajax({
      url: '/addCuePoint',
      type: 'POST',
      data: data,
      contentType: 'application/x-www-form-urlencoded',
      cache: false,
      processData: false,
      success: function (data, textStatus, jqXHR) {
        $('.container').load('listCuePoint', data);
      }
    });
    return false;
  })
</script>

codeSnippet.javascript:
<lucy include="AddAdCuePointForm"></lucy>
<script>
  $('#AddAdCuePointForm').submit(function() {
    var cuePoint = new KalturaAdCuePoint();
    cuePoint.cuePointType = KalturaCuePointType.AD;
    cuePoint.adType = KalturaAdType.VIDEO;
    cuePoint.protocolType = KalturaAdProtocolType.VAST;
    cuePoint.sourceUrl = $('input[name="sourceUrl"]').val();
    cuePoint.startTime = $('input[name="startTime"]').val();
    cuePoint.entryId = "<%- Lucy.answer('entryIdEqual') %>";
    client.cuePoint.add(function(success, cuePoint) {
      $('.container').html(CuePointAddedView({result: cuePoint}));
    }, cuePoint);
    return false;
  })
</script>
